Dear Sirs, 

 

Reference is made to the following Policy falling due for renewal on June 30, 2025:

 

Name of the Insured:

Mrs. Ingie Bechara Chehade

Policy Number:

01-FIR-2023-00259 (USD 517)

 

Kindly find attached the related renewal advice for your review and approval.

 

In addition, please advise the floor number and provide the title deed if possible.

 

Please note that renewal is obtained at same expiring terms and conditions subject to no deterioration in loss record up to final renewal/expiry date. 

 

Awaiting your advice in order to proceed accordingly. 

 

Thank you and best regards,
